p3pri_net.c File Reference

Detailed Description

Protected Point to Point template file

Copyright (C) Velocite 2010

The primary network functions include:

  • Routing to secondaries
  • Encrypting packets and encapsulating them in a modified IPSec packet

#include "p3net.h"

Function:
init_pri_net
Description:
Initialize the primary P3 system to listen for secondary P3 session requests.
Inputs:
  • None
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0 = OK
    • <0 = Error
